turns.content: please correct my grammar and sentence below
Sure, please provide the sentence you would like me to correct.
This service provides the application to the Notion Startup Program, which worth USD 1000 credits aka RM4435
This service provides an application to the Notion Startup Program, which is worth USD 1000 in credits, or RM4435.

This service provide a creation of "Knowledge Management System" for internal uses, which can be used for Staff to search for all of the information provided by the company, and also can be used by Management team to create the SOP in real-time for any emergency incident and can be sync to staff

This service provides the creation of a "Knowledge Management System" for internal use. This system can be utilized by staff to search for all information provided by the company and can also be used by the management team to create Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) in real-time for any emergency incidents. The SOPs can then be synced to the staff.
The "One-off payment" means this payment is not subscription services or payment.

The term "One-off payment" means that the payment is not a subscription or recurring payment. It is a single payment made for a particular product or service, without any further payment required in the future.
Please be noted that, the payment above is only for the services to-date. Any new services or services that are related to the below are charged seperately!
Please note that the payment above is only for the services rendered up to the present time. Any new services or services that are related to those listed will be charged separately.
This service involve a set-up for a Notion workspace, which involve the roles and privacy settings involved to the staff and management team
This service involves setting up a Notion workspace, including defining the roles and privacy settings for both the staff and management team.

This service involve setting up a database for "Medication Ordered", which the main objectives is to trace the flow of the medication, so that the management team are able to know what is the current status of the medication and the staff can check the quantity and the product name listed by the management team. Any incident happened for the medication can also can be updated to the database which the information will be sync to the management team in real time

This service involves setting up a database for "Medication Ordered" with the main objective of tracking the flow of medication. This will enable the management team to know the current status of the medication, and allow staff to check the quantity and product name listed by the management team. In the event of any incidents related to the medication, they can be updated in the database and the information will be synced to the management team in real-time.

This service involves setting up a database for "Patient's request". This database is for Staff to record when the medication requested by patient is not available in the clinic. And allowed the management team to order the medication accordingly. Once the medication arrived, staff can notify the patient based on the record

This service involves setting up a database for "Patient Requests". This database is for staff to record instances when a medication requested by a patient is not available in the clinic. The management team can then order the medication accordingly. Once the medication arrives, staff can notify the patient based on the record.

This services involve setting up a database for "Leave Request Document", which the main objective is to for staff to submit the Leave request for a specific date to management team, staff can also have the "Special Request" such as "2 consecutive off days, Seperate off days" requiresments that request to management team. The management team can approved accordingly.

This service involves setting up a database for "Leave Request Documents". The main objective of this database is for staff to submit their leave requests for specific dates to the management team. Staff can also make special requests, such as "two consecutive off days" or "separate off days", which will be reviewed and approved by the management team accordingly.

v2 of the database added the features such as:

1. The "Cancel General Request" & "Cancel Special Request" feature which allow staff to cancel the general request for their end. Management team will be reviewed and approved accordingly

2. The "Date Submitted" changed for the "Custom Date" to the "Current Date and time", which the staff can no longer change the date submitted to the past date, create the more control on the system to ensure the credibility of the data involved in the database

Version 2 of the database has added the following features:

1. The "Cancel General Request" and "Cancel Special Request" feature, which allows staff to cancel their general or special requests. The management team will review and approve the cancellation request accordingly.
2. The "Date Submitted" field has been changed from "Custom Date" to "Current Date and Time". Staff can no longer change the submitted date to a past date. This adds more control to the system and ensures the credibility of the data involved in the database.
Both versions are stored, management team can use either one based on the senario and case
Both versions of the database are stored, and the management team can use either one based on the scenario or case.
Is it possible to contact online and ask for quotation and sent via POS for the next purchase?

Yes, it is possible to contact online and ask for a quotation. Once the quotation is provided, it can be sent via email or any other online communication platform. If you wish to make a purchase, you can use a point-of-sale (POS) system to complete the transaction.

correct my grammar, as a buyer
Is it possible to contact online and ask for quotation and sent via POS for the next purchase?

As a buyer, the following sentence can be corrected as:

"Is it possible to contact the seller online and request a quotation, which can then be sent via POS for the next purchase?"

Please correct my grammar below, the message below are from We ("As Clinic") to the service provider called Yezza ("As Clinic appointment System provider")

1. The RM197 per month is that just for Clinic appointment system? or is part of your "GROWTH" plan which is included an e-commerce store?

2. What is the maximum number of users to use your systems? Can I have unlimited number of doctors and staff to access the back-end system with RM197 per month?

3. The time roster of the doctors is subject to change every day. 
(eg: 
Doctor A worked on 1 Mar 2022 (WEDNESDAY) at 1PM-5PM, but work 8 Mar 2022 (WEDNESDAY) at 3PM-10PM)
The question is, is that possible for me to change the time table on the DAILY basis on the appointment system?

4. Can user:
4.1 Cancel their own appointment from their end?
4.2 Reschedule their own appointment from their end?

5. Regarding SMS:
5.1 What is the cost for using SMS services? How much per SMS?
5.2 Can we close the features and enable our SMS gateway?

6. Do you provide API or Webhooks? Please kindly send the link of the documentation.

7. Can we set conditional rules on the appointment system?
Eg:
7.1 Based on the number of doctors on duty
- when 1 doctor on duty, 1 appointment every 2 hours
- when 2 doctors on duty, 1 appt every hour
7.2 Based on the time. (Assume we provide 2 Services which are "Screening" and "Checkup")
- I would like to only have the service "Screening" on every 900 AM - 1200 PM
- I would like to have all of the services ("Screening" and "Checkup" on every 1200 PM -1030PM)

As a proofreader, I would correct the grammar and language usage in your message as follows:

1. Is the RM197 per month just for the clinic appointment system or is it part of your "GROWTH" plan which includes an e-commerce store?
2. What is the maximum number of users allowed to use your system? Can an unlimited number of doctors and staff access the back-end system for RM197 per month?
3. The doctor's work schedule is subject to change every day. For example, Doctor A worked on March 1, 2022 (Wednesday) from 1PM-5PM, but on March 8, 2022 (Wednesday) from 3PM-10PM. Is it possible to change the timetable daily in the appointment system?
4. Can users:
4.1 Cancel their appointments on their own from their end?
4.2 Reschedule their appointments on their own from their end?
5. Regarding SMS:
5.1 What is the cost of using SMS services? How much per SMS?
5.2 Can we disable the SMS feature and enable our SMS gateway instead?
6. Do you provide API or Webhooks? Could you kindly send us the link to the documentation?
7. Can we set conditional rules in the appointment system? For example:
7.1 Based on the number of doctors on duty:
* When only one doctor is on duty, one appointment every two hours.
* When two doctors are on duty, one appointment every hour.
7.2 Based on the time. (Assuming we offer two services, "Screening" and "Checkup".)
* We would like to only offer the "Screening" service from 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM.
* We would like to offer both the "Screening" and "Checkup" services from 12:00 PM - 10:30 PM.
